page.title: 04Lanner (Today)
page.content: There is a village hall which is used for dancing classes,gymnastics,The Women's Institute, a babies' clinic, the Brownies, guides, guides and a chiropody clinic. It is also used as a Polling Station when necessary and can be hired by groups to put on jumble sales, exhibitions or concerts. There are 4 shops in Lanner including a Post Office and a Garden Centre which sells plants and garden equipment. Lanner school was founded in 1878 and now has new buildings. Children from the surrounding area attend the school from age 5 to age 11. There ia also a nursery unit for children from age 3 to age 5. Lanner has a flourishing silver band with about 20 senior members and 15 juniors.
